#include<stdio.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<bits/stdc++.h>
 using namespace std;

#define ll long long
int main()
{
    ll t;
   //array will have the capacity to store 1000 digits.
    ll n,i,j,m,p;

    scanf("%lld",&t);
    while(t--)
    {
       scanf("%lld",&n);
       ll a[n];
        scanf("%lld",&m);

       ll b[80];
       i=0;
       while(m!=0)
      {
        p= m%10;
        a[i] = p;
        m=m/10;
        i++;
      }
      j=0;
      n=i;
       for(i=0;i<n;i++)
       {

           if(a[i]==0 || a[i]==1)
            continue;
           else if(a[i]==6)
           {
                     //  printf("%lld\n",a[i]);
               b[j]=5;
               j++;
               b[j]=3;
               j++;
           }
           else if(a[i]==9)
           {
               b[j]=3;
               j++;
               b[j]=3;
               j++;
               b[j]=2;
               j++;
               b[j]=7;
              j++;
           }
            else if(a[i]==8)
           {
                 b[j]=2;
               j++;
               b[j]=2;
               j++;
               b[j]=2;
               j++;
               b[j]=7;
               j++;
           }
            else if(a[i]==4)
           {
                 b[j]=2;
               j++;
               b[j]=2;
               j++;
               b[j]=3;
               j++;
           }
           else
           {
             //  printf("aa");
               b[j]=a[i];
               j++;
           }
       }
       sort(b,b+j);
       for(i=j-1;i>=0;i--)
        printf("%lld",b[i]);
       printf("\n");
    }
    return 0;
}
